mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_building_dict (buildings_name, city_no, sector_id, pinyin,pinyin_letter,building_address) VALUES (#{buildingsName}, #{cityNo}, #{sectorId}, #{pinyin},#{pinyinLetter},#{buildingsAddress})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_building_dict SET buildings_name = #{buildingsName}, city_no = #{cityNo}, sector_id = #{sectorId}, pinyin = #{pinyin}, pinyin_letter = #{pinyinLetter}, building_address = #{buildingsAddress} WHERE buildings_id = #{buildingsId}
